classData.comment:
/**
 * Default configuration object.
 * Defines the structure and default values for the server configuration.
 */
classData.description: Default configuration object. Defines the structure and default values for the server configuration.
classData.name: defaultConfig

classData.description: Global debug flag for all MCP servers.
classData.name: debug

classData.description: A dummy embedding function to satisfy the ChromaDB API when embeddings are provided manually.
classData.name: dummyEmbeddingFunction

classData.description: Cache duration for healthy health checks (in milliseconds). Unhealthy results are never cached.
classData.name: healthCheckCacheDuration

classData.description: The minimum required version of the GitHub CLI (gh).
classData.name: minGhVersion

classData.description: The owner of the GitHub repository.
classData.name: owner

classData.description: The name of the GitHub repository.
classData.name: repo

classData.description: Whether to automatically trigger a full sync when the server starts.
classData.name: syncOnStartup

classData.description: Configuration for the issue synchronization service.
classData.name: issueSync

classData.description: The path to the directory for active issues.
classData.name: issuesDir

classData.description: The path to the directory for archived issues.
classData.name: archiveDir

classData.description: The path to the synchronization metadata file.
classData.name: metadataFile

classData.description: Labels that, when present on an issue, will cause it to be ignored and deleted locally.
classData.name: droppedLabels

classData.description: The date from which to start synchronizing issues and releases.
classData.name: syncStartDate

classData.description: The path to the directory for release notes.
classData.name: releaseNotesDir

classData.description: The default version directory to use for archiving issues when no release is found.
classData.name: defaultArchiveVersion

classData.description: A prefix for issue filenames to prevent them from starting with a number (e.g., 'issue-').
classData.name: issueFilenamePrefix

classData.description: A prefix for version-based archive directories (e.g., 'v' for 'v1.2.3'). Applies to both milestone titles and release tags.
classData.name: versionDirectoryPrefix

classData.description: A prefix for release note filenames (e.g., 'v').
classData.name: releaseFilenamePrefix

classData.description: The maximum number of issues to fetch from the GitHub API in a single sync.
classData.name: maxIssues

classData.description: The maximum number of releases to fetch from the GitHub API.
classData.name: maxReleases

classData.description: The number of releases to fetch per page in GraphQL queries.
classData.name: releaseQueryLimit

classData.description: The maximum buffer size for the gh CLI command output.
classData.name: maxGhOutputBuffer

classData.description: The markdown delimiter used to separate the issue body from the comments section.
classData.name: commentSectionDelimiter

classData.description: Maximum number of labels to fetch per issue in GraphQL queries.
classData.name: maxLabelsPerIssue

classData.description: Maximum number of labels to fetch for the entire repository in GraphQL queries.
classData.name: maxRepoLabels

classData.description: Maximum number of assignees to fetch per issue in GraphQL queries.
classData.name: maxAssigneesPerIssue

classData.description: Maximum number of comments to fetch per issue in GraphQL queries.
classData.name: maxCommentsPerIssue

classData.description: Maximum number of sub-issues to fetch per issue in GraphQL queries.
classData.name: maxSubIssuesPerIssue

classData.description: Maximum number of timeline items to fetch per issue in GraphQL queries.
classData.name: maxTimelineItemsPerIssue

classData.description: Configuration for pull request queries.
classData.name: pullRequest

classData.description: Default values for pull request queries.
classData.name: defaults

classData.description: The default number of pull requests to return.
classData.name: limit

classData.description: The default state of pull requests to list.
classData.name: state

classData.description: The maximum number of pull requests that can be fetched in a single API call.
classData.name: maxLimit

classData.description: Maximum number of comments to fetch per pull request in GraphQL queries.
classData.name: maxCommentsPerPullRequest

classData.comment:
/**
 * @summary Configuration manager for the GitHub Workflow MCP server.
 *
 * Supports loading configuration from a custom file and merging with defaults.
 * The configuration handles GitHub repository details, sync settings, and server behavior options.
 *
 * @class Neo.ai.mcp.server.github-workflow.Config
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 * @singleton
 */
classData.summary:
Configuration manager for the GitHub Workflow MCP server.

Supports loading configuration from a custom file and merging with defaults.
The configuration handles GitHub repository details, sync settings, and server behavior options.
classData.name: Config

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.ai.mcp.server.github-workflow.Config'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {Boolean} singleton=true
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: singleton

classData.comment:
/**
     * The current configuration object.
     * Starts with defaults and can be updated via load().
     * @member {Object} data
     */
classData.description: The current configuration object. Starts with defaults and can be updated via load().
classData.name: data

classData.comment:
/**
     * Initializes the configuration object by deep cloning the defaults.
     * @param {Object} config
     */
classData.description: Initializes the configuration object by deep cloning the defaults.
classData.name: construct

classData.description: Loads configuration from a JSON file and merges it with defaults.
classData.name: load
